attributes.action: Help and support me to stop these sick people getting away with it
attributes.additional_details: Read your newspapers daily and there is an article of cruelty to animals make enquiries to vets and shelters all over and the evidence is there, so please support me stop the cruelty now thankyou.
attributes.background: More and more animals on a daily basis are badly beaten tortured and killed  and the law isn't giving out punishment these people that commit these crimes should be giving sentences for it .

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you are concerned about animal cruelty, but are not sure you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

If you want the Government to review animal cruelty laws to include lifetime ban and a prison sentence, you may wish to sign this petition:  

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/232131

You could also start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
